attributes.action: Do not let Racism cloud your judgement. It should be judged on equal terms.
attributes.additional_details: Racism is going on all around the world and all white races are being forced by this racial disadvantage of not being judged on equal terms, therefore UK parliament should rethink it's attitude toward Racism and Equal rights, Serious attention needs to be paid to this subject to enable this country to overcome this black hole of equal rights for all peoples of the world.
attributes.background: Favoritism of one side or the other should be judged on equal terms. other ethnic races around the world do appear to have an unfair advantage against all white races, this should never be allowed to cloud the judgement of any MP or Politician.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
